ygData.msgSnippet: ... Pathetic Maximal.  No one defeats the Oblitercons, no one!  Not Koga Shuko, not the Tripredacus, and most certainly not some damn Maximal on a power

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Ramhorn/Stinkbomb:

::Dark One yells in slight pain at Liono Prime's attack::
"Pathetic Maximal.  No one defeats the Oblitercons, no one!  Not Koga Shuko, 
not the Tripredacus, and most certainly not some damn Maximal on a power 
trip!"
::Dark One yells, taking out his sub-machine gun from subspace, firing off a 
volley of explosive shells at Liono::

::Scavenger yells in pain, falling back::
"Vile witch!  I will form an ash tray out of your spare parts!"
::Getting down to a knee and firing a rocket from his missile launcher off at 
Iron Raptor::

::Pyro fires off five fire balls from his flame cannon down at Ramhorn, who 
had just arrived on the battle scene, falling to the ground screaming in 
pain::

::Hiss laughed, this was fun:: 
(Hearing his leader yell, he turned, firing off a volley of several fusion 
blasts off at Liono's chest)

::Breakdown smiled, firing off a grenade that will explode on impact off at 
Liono, then firing two down towards the advancing Maximals::

::Nemesis smiled at seeing Liono:: 
"Ah, a party!" ::Pulling his energon sword, he leaps in the air, slashing at 
Liono's blast and firinga volley of laser bolts at the leader of the Maximal::

----

::Stinkbomb saw Ramhorn fall, slid to him, taking his sub-machine gun and 
letting a volley of sonic shells off at Zardus and Hiss::
